projectV2.shortDescription: Project used as development environment by rulasg
projectV2.title: rulasg-dev-700

content.body:
## Description
Configure unit, integration, and API testing infrastructure for the Web API project.

## Tasks
- [ ] Set up test project with appropriate framework (xUnit, NUnit, MSTest)
- [ ] Configure mocking library (Moq, NSubstitute)
- [ ] Create base classes for different test types
- [ ] Set up test database for integration tests
- [ ] Implement API endpoint tests
- [ ] Configure code coverage reporting
- [ ] Set up continuous testing in CI/CD

## Acceptance Criteria
- Unit tests for service and business logic
- Integration tests for database operations
- API tests for endpoint functionality
- Test configuration is environment-independent
- Code coverage reports are generated
content.title: Set up testing infrastructure

milestone.title: Milestone 3: Quality and Deployment
milestone.description: Testing, documentation, and deployment pipeline setup

content.body:
## Description
Set up Dependency Injection (DI) to handle service registration and lifecycle management for the API.

## Tasks
- [ ] Configure built-in DI container in Program.cs/Startup.cs
- [ ] Register services with appropriate lifetimes (Singleton, Scoped, Transient)
- [ ] Implement service interfaces and their implementations
- [ ] Set up options pattern for configuration objects
- [ ] Document service dependencies

## Acceptance Criteria
- All services properly registered in DI container
- Services have appropriate lifetime scopes
- Service interfaces follow SOLID principles
- Dependencies are properly injected into controllers
content.title: Configure Dependency Injection and services

milestone.title: Milestone 1: Project Setup
milestone.description: Initial project setup and basic infrastructure

content.body:
## Description
Create controllers and endpoints for the Web API to handle HTTP requests.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create a base controller class with common functionality
- [ ] Implement CRUD controllers for main resources
- [ ] Add appropriate routing attributes
- [ ] Implement proper HTTP status code responses
- [ ] Document endpoints using XML comments for Swagger/OpenAPI

## Acceptance Criteria
- Controllers properly handle GET, POST, PUT, DELETE operations
- Routes follow RESTful principles
- Appropriate HTTP status codes are returned
- Controller methods have XML documentation
content.title: Implement API endpoints and controllers

milestone.title: Milestone 2: Core Functionality
milestone.description: Implementation of core API features and data handling

content.body: Draft roadmap for implementing comprehensive API security including authentication mechanisms review, authorization strategy, data encryption approach, API key management, and security monitoring.
content.title: Security Implementation Roadmap

content.body: Draft plan for containerizing the API and setting up deployment infrastructure including Docker containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, and CI/CD pipeline configuration.
content.title: Containerization and Deployment Strategy

content.body:
## Description
Implement rate limiting and throttling for the API to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage.

## Tasks
- [ ] Add rate limiting middleware (e.g., AspNetCoreRateLimit)
- [ ] Configure client-based rate limits
- [ ] Implement endpoint-specific throttling rules
- [ ] Set up IP-based rate limiting
- [ ] Add rate limit information to response headers
- [ ] Configure response handling for rate-limited requests
- [ ] Document rate limiting policy for API consumers

## Acceptance Criteria
- Rate limiting prevents excessive requests from single clients
- Different limits can be applied based on client identity
- Rate limit headers are included in API responses
- Appropriate status codes (429 Too Many Requests) are returned
- Rate limiting policy is clearly documented
content.title: Configure rate limiting and throttling
